Email Conversation Export
=========================

Folder: CH2OMS8 - nominations for chalhoub excellence awards 2024 are now open
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CH2OMS8_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-16 13:30
Subject: Nominations for Chalhoub Excellence Awards 2024 Are Now Open
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/NDvBNa5dkE6pXf9XV7g-IQ/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/NDvBNa5dkE6pXf9XV7g-IQ/548546/FE62B57B51A1B6FEB6701F9C38D9F93C/banner-54.png> 	

Nominations are now open for the Chalhoub Excellence Awards (CEA)


These awards provide an opportunity to honor and recognise the remarkable achievements made by you and your teams across seven categories: 
Impactful Sustainability, Collaboration & Co-Creation, Customer Centricity, Servant Leadership, Entrepreneurial Spirit & Innovation, Excellence, and Diversity, Equity & Inclusion.

It is time to recognise your successes and the contributions that made a difference. We encourage everyone to participate and highlight the great work happening within our teams.

Nominations will be open to all team members until November 22nd.

chunks.text:
<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/NDvBNa5dkE6pXf9XV7g-IQ/548653/E21A37BAC13FE729D77D8753B21855C6/untitled-design-2023-11-13t110510-049.png> 	
Recognises individuals/teams whose contribution or approaches have created longer term gain for the Group in relation to our ethical, social, environmental, cultural, or economic agenda.

Recognises individuals/teams whose start-up mindset and breakthrough ideas have radically transformed an area of our business and inspired others.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/NDvBNa5dkE6pXf9XV7g-IQ/548660/534595B1351DBAAD6AAB24E08FA0BB73/untitled-design-2023-11-13t111922-670.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/NDvBNa5dkE6pXf9XV7g-IQ/548656/B1BB3461B4680730F1E06C0C5A678865/untitled-design-2023-11-13t110854-867.png> 	
Recognises individuals (at any level in the business) who bring to life a servant mindset in a way that significantly impacts the growth and development of their team or those they impact.

Recognises individuals/teams who have adopted new approaches to provide customers (internally or externally) with experiences which exceed expectation and drive long lasting relationships.

<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/NDvBNa5dkE6pXf9XV7g-IQ/548660/534595B1351DBAAD6AAB24E08FA0BB73/untitled-design-2023-11-13t111922-670.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/NDvBNa5dkE6pXf9XV7g-IQ/548656/B1BB3461B4680730F1E06C0C5A678865/untitled-design-2023-11-13t110854-867.png> 	
Recognises individuals (at any level in the business) who bring to life a servant mindset in a way that significantly impacts the growth and development of their team or those they impact.

Recognises individuals/teams who have adopted new approaches to provide customers (internally or externally) with experiences which exceed expectation and drive long lasting relationships.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/NDvBNa5dkE6pXf9XV7g-IQ/548657/AB1057D810FCE4BB8104951919330D96/untitled-design-2023-11-13t111444-997.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/NDvBNa5dkE6pXf9XV7g-IQ/548659/38D7E3A6901833206A4E4CBF23FA59F8/untitled-design-2023-11-13t111736-558.png> 	
Recognises individuals/teams who work effectively with others to break down silos, build trust, teamwork effectiveness, and increase efficiencies, resulting in outputs which support the sustainability of the Group.

Recognises individuals/teams who consistently achieve high performance through exceeding expectations, demonstrating resilience, going above & beyond and deliver exceptional results

Recognises individuals/teams who work effectively with others to break down silos, build trust, teamwork effectiveness, and increase efficiencies, resulting in outputs which support the sustainability of the Group.

Recognises individuals/teams who consistently achieve high performance through exceeding expectations, demonstrating resilience, going above & beyond and deliver exceptional results

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/NDvBNa5dkE6pXf9XV7g-IQ/548662/546FC2D26D199B6FF6CB92469B3EC463/untitled-design-2023-11-13t112321-946.png>

Recognises individuals/teams who promote diversity, going beyond gender balance to embrace various thoughts, cultures, backgrounds, and abilities. They priorities a healthy workplace where everyone is supported, valued and respected.
